section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:He heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: "Prayer at night is two rak'ahs by two rak'ahs, then when you fear tat dawn will break, pray witr with one rak'ah
